name: unworthily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that deserves no respect, admiration, or support : We can all think of people whose success has been unworthily acquired. She felt he was treating her improperly and unworthily.
More examplesFewer examplesThere is something unworthily reassuring about seeing people whose problems are so extreme; it makes us feel better about ourselves. She was ashamed of their plan, finding it unworthily small-minded.This promise must not be made unworthily or without due thought and sincerity.
